ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | negidd.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 |  | pncand.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | subaddd.3 | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_addsub | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. CC ) -> ( ( A + B ) - C ) = ( ( A - C ) + B ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) - C ) = ( ( A - C ) + B ) ) |
